I am currently in charge of implementing client success programs with AppointmentPlus scheduling software. I have developed strategies to drive early adoption and engagement for all clients both new and old. Additionally, I measure, analyze, and combat churn with a process that gathers true churn data, as well as a client recovery program. Using my previous experiences in client support and marketing, I am able to openly communicate with the other departments in the company to efficiently deliver quality experiences for our clients.

I’m a Demand Generation Marketing Specialist for AppointmentPlus, an appointment scheduling software company focused on worldwide Enterprise level appointment scheduling. In this role I control the company’s lead generation efforts, manage our social platforms, enhance nurturing automation campaigns through HubSpot and Salesforce, as well as provide assistance and constructive feedback to the Creative, Optimization, and Business Insights teams.

In this role I was accountable for handling the incoming flow of client requests in the day to day activities at AppointmentPlus. I worked closely with our Marketing and Support teams to ensure the best client interaction. As a team we were able to consistently maintain a client satisfaction level of over 90%

I coach soccer to a group of young men in Anthem, Arizona.Having played soccer for 18 years myself, I know how important the core values of learning how to work as a team, individual effort and establishing a work ethic early are. I teach these practices to these young men with the hopes that they take away some of the key points and transfer them to the field, as well as every other aspect of their lives.

Ryan Bradley is a rock. Positive and easy to approach, Ryan is one of the most dependable individuals I've come across in my professional career. When presented with an issue Ryan works swiftly to come to his resolution while also making sure that those who are affected are kept up to date. Ryan is not afraid to ask questions and step out of his comfort zone, this has treated him well and explains his upward movement within AppointmentPlus.  Ryan is an integral part to any organization he is apart of and I urge you to consider bringing him into yours.

summary: I’m a Demand Generation Marketing Specialist for AppointmentPlus, an appointment scheduling software company focused on worldwide Enterprise level appointment scheduling. In this role I control the company’s lead generation efforts, manage our social platforms, enhance nurturing automation campaigns through HubSpot and Salesforce, as well as provide assistance and constructive feedback to the Creative, Optimization, and Business Insights teams. Before joining AppointmentPlus, I worked for LC Contractors in Quincy, Illinois as a Project Manager. I was lucky enough to work hand in hand with homeowners and their vision of their new homes.I’m truly passionate about my work and always eager to connect with others. While I enjoy all aspects of my job, I think my favorite stage of a project is working with my great colleagues through the planning stages in order to ensure the best plan of attack to reach our goalsI’m always interested in hearing from former colleagues, marketers, or just interesting and creative people, so feel free to contact me if you’d like to connect.
